name: Othello - Board Game Club HD
description:
Othello is a strategy board game for two players, played on an 8×8 uncheckered board. The player's goal is to have a majority of their colored pieces showing at the end of the game, turning over as many of their opponent's pieces as possible.
With this Othello, you can play with a friend who sits next to you or play against your phone.
The artificial intelligence embeded in the game allows a player to play a very easy mode but also much harder and challenging modes.

Features

* Multiple language support: English, Chinese and Japanese

* Customize player name and avatar

* Score tracking and auto player rank

* Easy to learn

* Undo function

* Highlight possible moves

* Great graphics and awesome sound effects

* Play against a friend or the challenging computer on the same device, or play against a friend on two devices connected via Bluetooth
